   <style type="text/css">
	.avayaColor{
		min-height: 95px;
		/* Permalink - use to edit and share this gradient: http://colorzilla.com/gradient-editor/#d71e00+0,bd1900+100 */
		background: rgb(215,30,0); /* Old browsers */
		background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, rgba(215,30,0,1) 0%, rgba(189,25,0,1) 100%); /* FF3.6-15 */
		background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, rgba(215,30,0,1) 0%,rgba(189,25,0,1) 100%); /* Chrome10-25,Safari5.1-6 */
		background: linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(215,30,0,1) 0%,rgba(189,25,0,1) 100%); /* W3C, IE10+, FF16+, Chrome26+, Opera12+, Safari7+ */
		filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#d71e00', endColorstr='#bd1900',GradientType=0 ); /* IE6-9 */
	}
	.avayaColor img{
		text-align: center;
		margin: 0 auto;
		max-height: 80px;
		margin-top: 10px;
	}
	main.dpslate-content{
		margin-bottom: 50px;
	}
	
</style>

         <button type="button" class="btn btn-default nav2-font dropdown-toggle" data-toggle="dropdown" aria-haspopup="true" aria-expanded="false"> Windows <span class="caret"></span> </button> 
         <ul class="dropdown-menu"> 
          <li><a href="/site/global/products_resources/avaya_client_sdk/programming_docs/current/windows/communication/index.gsp">Communication Services</a></li> 
         </ul> 
        </div> 
        <div class="btn-group level2" role="group"> 
         <button type="button" class="btn btn-default nav2-font dropdown-toggle" data-toggle="dropdown" aria-haspopup="true" aria-expanded="false"> macOS <span class="caret"></span> </button> 
         <ul class="dropdown-menu"> 
          <li><a href="/site/global/products_resources/avaya_client_sdk/programming_docs/current/macos/communication/index.gsp">Communication Services</a></li> 
         </ul> 
        </div> 
        <div class="btn-group level2" role="group"> 
         <button type="button" class="btn btn-default nav2-font dropdown-toggle" data-toggle="dropdown" aria-haspopup="true" aria-expanded="false"> JavaScript <span class="caret"></span> </button> 
         <ul class="dropdown-menu"> 
          <li><a href="/site/global/products_resources/avaya_client_sdk/programming_docs/current/javascript/communication/index.gsp">Communication Services</a></li> 
          <li><a href="/site/global/products_resources/avaya_client_sdk/programming_docs/current/javascript/meeting_management/index.gsp">Meeting Management Services</a></li> 
          <li><a href="/site/global/products_resources/avaya_client_sdk/programming_docs/current/javascript/recording_management/index.gsp">Recording Management Services</a></li> 
          <li><a href="/site/global/products_resources/avaya_client_sdk/programming_docs/current/javascript/customer_interaction/index.gsp">Customer Interaction Services</a></li> 
          <li><a href="/site/global/products_resources/avaya_client_sdk/programming_docs/current/javascript/customer_interaction_utilities/index.gsp">Customer Interaction Utilities</a></li>

          <li><a href="/site/global/products_resources/avaya_client_sdk/programming_docs/current/javascript/sharing/index.gsp">Sharing Services</a></li> 
         </ul> 
        </div> 
       </div> 
       <!-- END SECOND LEVEL NAV --> </li> 
     </ul> 
    </div> 
    <div class="btn-group level1" role="group"> 
     <a href="/site/global/products_resources/avaya_client_sdk/developer_downloads/index.gsp" class="btn btn-default nav1-font" role="button">Developer Downloads</a> 
    </div>

     <a href="/site/global/products_resources/avaya_client_sdk/licensing/index.gsp" class="btn btn-default nav1-font" role="button">Licensing</a>

     <a href="/site/global/products_resources/avaya_client_sdk/support/index.gsp" class="btn btn-default nav1-font" role="button">Support &amp; Testing Options</a> 
    </div> 
   </div> 
  </div> 
  <script>
(function($){
	$(document).ready(function(){
		$('ul.dropdown-menu [data-toggle=dropdown]').on('click', function(event) {
			event.preventDefault();
			event.stopPropagation();
			$(this).parent().siblings().removeClass('open');
			$(this).parent().toggleClass('open');
		});
	});
})(jQuery);
</script>

  <!-- ================ --> 
  <div class="scrollToTop">
   <strong>^</strong>
  </div> 
  <div id="mainWindow" class="container-fluid slate-fluid"> 
   <!-- Example row of columns --> 
   <div class="row-fluid slate-fluid"> 
    <div id="slateWrapper"> 
     <div class="span2 align-items-center  col-xs-12 col-md-2"> 
      <div id="frontmatter" class="scrollspy" data-spy="affix" data-offset-top="80" data-offset-bottom="0"> 
       <div class="doc-title">
         JavaScript Meeting Management Services Package 
       </div>

         <div class="toc-title">
           Table of Contents

        <div> 
         <ul class="nav submenu-1" id="nav">  
          <li class="toc-h2"> <a href="#package-overview-1158" class="toc-h2"> Package Overview </a> </li>

     <div id="slateMainBlk" class="span10 col-xs-12 col-md-10 slate-content"> 
      <div class="page-wrapper"> 
       <div class="dark-box"></div> 
       <div class="content"> 
        <h1 id="recording-management-services-package-for-javascript-1157">Recording Management Services Package for JavaScript</h1>
        <h2 id="package-overview-1158">Package Overview</h2>
        <p>The Recording Management Service Package provides a set of APIs allowing application developers to embed Avaya Equinox Streaming &amp; Recording functionality into their applications. The Breeze Client SDK provides APIs supporting the following Streaming &amp; Recording features: </p> 
        <ul> 
         <li>Recording's Management 
          <ul> 
           <li>Retrieving programs</li> 
           <li>Retrieving live/future broadcasts</li> 
           <li>Update/remove/recovery programs</li> 
           <li>Retrieving templates, categories</li> 
           <li>Reporting recording's view duration</li> 
          </ul></li> 
         <li>Setting Services 
          <ul> 
           <li>Getting Tenant settings</li> 
           <li>Getting System Settings</li> 
          </ul></li> 
         <li>Player Service 
          <ul> 
           <li>Getting player's html content automatically</li> 
           <li>Getting player content on your choice from HTML5, WMP, Flash, Silverlight</li> 
          </ul></li> 
        </ul> 
        <p>Features availability depend on the users access level. A user can obtain access as either a authorized or guest user. </p>
        <h2 id="api-reference-1159">API Reference</h2> 
        <ul> 
         <li><a href="api_refs/jsrecording/index.html" target="_blank">JavaScript Recording Management Services API Reference Guide</a></li> 
         <li><a href="api_refs/jsplayer/index.html" target="_blank">JavaScript Players library for Recording Management Services API Reference Guide</a></li> 
        </ul> 
        <h2 id="guide-articles-1160">Guide Articles</h2>
        <h3 id="getting-started-1161">Getting Started</h3> 
        <ul> 
         <li><a href="guide/my_first_project.gsp">My First Project</a></li> 
        </ul> 
        <h3 id="recording-39-s-management-1162">Recording's Management</h3> 
        <ul> 
         <li><a href="guide/fetching_programs.gsp">Retrieving programs</a></li> 
         <li><a href="guide/fetching_broadcasts.gsp">Retrieving live/future broadcasts</a></li> 
         <li><a href="guide/modify_programs.gsp">Update/remove/recovery programs</a></li> 
         <li><a href="guide/fetching_templates_categories.gsp">Retrieving templates, categories</a></li> 
         <li><a href="guide/report_view_duration.gsp">Reporting recording's view duration</a></li> 
        </ul> 
        <h3 id="setting-services-1163">Setting Services</h3> 
        <ul> 
         <li><a href="guide/fetching_settings.gsp">Retrieving settings</a></li> 
        </ul> 
        <h3 id="report-services-1164">Report Services</h3> 
        <ul> 
         <li><a href="guide/program_access_reports.gsp">Viewing reports</a></li> 
        </ul> 
        <h3 id="features-1165">Features</h3> 
        <ul> 
         <li><a href="guide/guest_or_authorized_request.gsp">Guest and User access</a></li> 
         <li><a href="guide/custom_login_callbacks.gsp">Custom Login/Logout Callbacks</a></li> 
         <li><a href="guide/using_player_library.gsp">Using Player Library</a></li> 
        </ul> 
        <h2 id="technical-articles-1166">Technical Articles</h2>
        <h3 id="building-and-initializing-the-client-sdk-1167">Building and Initializing the Client SDK</h3> 
        <ul> 
         <li><a href="tech/build_and_runtime_environment.gsp">Build and Runtime Environment</a></li> 
         <li><a href="tech/configuring_the_sdk.gsp">Configuring The SDK</a></li> 
         <li><a href="tech/initializing_sdk.gsp">Initializing SDK</a></li> 
        </ul> 
        <h3 id="platform-and-solution-considerations-1168">Platform and Solution Considerations</h3> 
        <ul> 
         <li><a href="tech/secure_configuration.gsp">Secure Configuration</a></li> 
         <li><a href="tech/working_credentials.gsp">Working with Credentials</a></li> 
        </ul> 
        <h3 id="trouble-shooting-and-debugging-1169">Trouble Shooting and Debugging</h3> 
        <ul> 
         <li><a href="tech/troubleshooting_and_debugging.gsp">Troubleshooting and Debugging</a></li> 
        </ul> 
       </div>

        <div class="lang-selector" id="myLang">

       </div>

  <!--display need to activate message --> 
  <div id="activate_msg" class="top-right"></div> 
  <!--end activation message --> 
  <!-- first time visitor message --> 
  <!--	
    <script type="text/javascript">
					//<![CDATA[
					
					function createCookie(name,value,days) {
					  if (days) {
						var date = new Date();
						date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));
						var expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();
					  }
					  else var expires = "";
					  document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";
					}
					
					function readCookie(name) {
					  var nameEQ = name + "=";
					  var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
					  for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++) {
						var c = ca[i];
						while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);
						if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);
					  }
					  return null;
					}
					
					function showModal() {
					
					  	$('#activate_msg').jGrowl("<strong>Welcome to the new DevConnect Portal</strong><br /><br />If this is the first time you have visited this new site <strong>you must reset your password.</strong><br /><br /> <a href='/register/forgotPassword'><span style='color:#cc0000;'>Please click here to begin the process of resetting your password.</span></a> ", {
							closer: false,
							theme: 'dpcom',
							sticky: true, 
							glue: 'before',
							easing: 'easeInOutElastic',
							animateOpen: { 
								height: "show",
								width: "show"
							},
							animateClose: { 
								height: "hide",
								width: "show"
							}
						});
					}
					
					var visited = readCookie('mypopup');
					
					if (!visited) {
					  $(document).ready(function(){
						showModal();
						createCookie('mypopup','no',0);
					  });
					}
					
					//]]>
					</script>
	  --> 
  <!-- end first time visitor message --> 
  <!--<script type="text/javascript">
	//<![CDATA[
	
	function createCookie(name,value,days) {
	  if (days) {
		var date = new Date();
		date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));
		var expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();
	  }
	  else var expires = "";
	  document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";
	}
	
	function readCookie(name) {
	  var nameEQ = name + "=";
	  var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
	  for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++) {
		var c = ca[i];
		while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);
		if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);
	  }
	  return null;
	}
	
	function showModal() {
	
		$('#activate_msg').jGrowl("<h3>Maintenance Notification</h3><p><b>When:</b> Saturday, October 24, 2015<br /><<b>Time:</b> 10am - 12pm CST (GMT +6)</p><p>During this window the portal will not be available. All services, including technical support, procurement, remote lab access requests, testing requests and enhanced-level membership applications will not be accessible.</p>", {
			closer: false,
			theme: 'dpcom',
			sticky: true, 
			glue: 'before',
			easing: 'easeInOutElastic',
			animateOpen: { 
				height: "show",
				width: "show"
			},
			animateClose: { 
				height: "hide",
				width: "show"
			}
		});
	}
	
	var visited = readCookie('serverMaintenance10-24-15');
	
	if (!visited) {
	  $(document).ready(function(){
		showModal();
		createCookie('serverMaintenance10-24-15','no',0);
	  });
	}
	
	//]]>
</script>-->  
  <script src="/site/js/bootstrap/3.3.5/js/bootstrap.min.js"></script> 
  <script>
    $(document).ready(function(){
      $(".dropdown a.sub-dropdown").on("click", function(e){
      $(this).next("ul").toggle();
      e.stopPropagation();
      e.preventDefault();
      });
    });

    var leftColWidth =   $(".align-items-center").width();
    $("#toc").css("width",leftColWidth+13);
    $("#searchTool").css("width",leftColWidth+13);
    $("div.doc-title").css("width",leftColWidth-13);

    $( window ).resize(function() {
      var leftColWidth =   $(".align-items-center").width();
      $("#toc").css("width",leftColWidth+13);
      $("#searchTool").css("width",leftColWidth+13);
      $("div.doc-title").css("width",leftColWidth-13);
    });

  </script> 
  <script src="/static/js/jquery.lazyload.min.js"></script> 
  <script src="/static/js/jquery-scrolltofixed-min.js"></script> 
  <script src="/static/js/lang.js"></script> 
  <script src="/static/js/imagesloaded.min.js"></script> 
  <script src="/static/js/energize.js"></script> 
  <script src="/static/js/lunr.js"></script> 
  <script src="/static/js/jquery.highlight.js"></script> 
  <script src="/static/js/search.js"></script> 
  <script>
    $('#documentSearch').on('click', function toggleSearch(e) {
      if($('button.docSearchBtn span').hasClass('glyphicon glyphicon-search')) {
        $('button.docSearchBtn').html('<span class="glyphicon glyphicon-th-list"></span>');
      }
      else {
        $('button.docSearchBtn').html('<span class="glyphicon glyphicon-search"></span>');
      }
      $("#input-search").val("").keyup();
      $("#searchTool").collapse("toggle");
      $("#toc").collapse("toggle");
      $("#input-search").focus();
    });
  </script> 
  <script>

  $(document).ready(function(){
    $('[data-toggle="tooltip"]').tooltip();
    $('[data-toggle="popover"]').popover();

    var mainHeight = $('#mainWindow').height();
    var smallWindow = $("#slateMainBlk").height();
    var windowH = $(window).height();

    //console.log(mainHeight + "mainHeight");
    //console.log(smallWindow + "smallWindow");
    if(mainHeight < windowH){
      $('#mainWindow').css({'height':($(window).height()) + 'px'});
      $("#slateMainBlk").css({'height':($(window).height()) + 'px'});
      console.log(mainHeight + "mainHeight");
    }
    //$("#slateMainBlk").css({'height':(mainHeight) + 'px'});

    $( window ).resize(function() {
      var mainHeight = $('#mainWindow').height();
      $("#slateMainBlk").css({'height':(mainHeight) + 'px'});
      //console.log(mainHeight + "mainHeight");
    });
  });


  $('#myAffixTarget li a').click(function(event) {
      event.preventDefault();
      $($(this).attr('href'))[0].scrollIntoView();
      scrollBy(0, -70);
  });

    $(function() {
      setupLanguages([]);
    });


   $('#myLang').scrollToFixed({marginTop: 0,
      preFixed: function() { },
      postFixed: function() {

      }
    });


    $("img.lazy").lazyload({
        threshold : 200
    });

    $(".apiref").click(function () {

      var iframeTargetHref = $(this).attr("href") +"?v=" + Math.random();;
      var $iframeTarget = $("#iframeTargetSrc");

      $('#myIframeModal').on('shown.bs.modal', function () {
         $(this).append("<div class='iframloader'>Loading...</div>")
         $iframeTarget.attr("src",iframeTargetHref);

      })




      $('#myIframeModal').modal({show:true});
      return false;
    });






  </script> 
  <!-- configure the accordion function on the table of contents --> 
  <style>
              .toc-submenu-1 { display: block }
              .toc-submenu-2 { display: block }
      </style> 
  <script>
        $(document).ready(function(){
          $('[data-toggle="tooltip"]').tooltip();
          $('[data-toggle="popover"]').popover();
        });

      </script> 
  <style>

 #myIframeModal iframe {
   zoom: 0.6;
 }


  @media screen and (min-width: 768px) {

  	#myIframeModal  .modal-dialog  {width:900px;}
  }

  #myIframeModal  .modal-dialog  {width:75%;}
  #myIframeModal iframe {height:700px;}

  @supports (-moz-appearance:none) and (display:contents) {
    #myIframeModal  .modal-dialog
    {
      width:75%;
    }

    #myIframeModal iframe {
      height: 60vh;
    }
  }


  @media all and (-ms-high-contrast: none), (-ms-high-contrast: active) {
    #myIframeModal iframe {
      zoom: 1;
      height: 500px;
    }
  }

 </style>   
 </body>
</html>
